feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.12.0.knots20160226 release candidate 1 available

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.12.0.knots20160226 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots version 0.12.0.knots20160226.rc1 binaries are now available for download on their website and the source code can be found on GitHub under the signed tag. This updated release offers new features, bug fixes, and other improvements. As a release candidate, it is a test version for releases that will be tagged as final if no critical problems arise. Preliminary release notes are also available on their GitHub page. Users are encouraged to report bugs using the issue tracker at GitHub and additional Gitian signatures are welcome and can be submitted through pull requests.
